attributes.action: Research the true cost to tax payers for the influx of refugees and immigrants.
attributes.additional_details:
Muslim Immigrants/refugees: Just 18% have employment. 
Evidence - Mobility Commission Report

Muslim Immigrants/refugees: one in seven of the prison population.
Evidence - https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/number-of-muslims-in-prison-doubles-in-decade-to-12000-9222237.html
attributes.background: As much as we want to help immigrants/refugees we believe the cost to tax payers is not sustainable. ie: reports show that only 18% of Muslim immigrants/refugees have employment. We believe this is placing a strain on the benefit system, housing, schools, prisons & NHS to the determent of all.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
